scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && npm i --save-dev @types/bcrypt @types/jsonwebtoken && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: cd server && npm i && npm i --save-dev @types/bcrypt @types/jsonwebtoken && npm run build && cd ../client && npm i && npm run build
